reviews.text: Okay, I havenâ€™t been using this long enough to speak to major results yet, but I wanted to share my initial thoughts because I know sometimes the first impression is what makes or breaks whether something stays in your routine. The oil itself is lovelyâ€”really nice texture, not too thick or greasy, and the scent is honestly so good. It has that natural, herbal smell that feels spa-like without being overpowering. Application was super easy, and I appreciate that it doesnâ€™t drip all over or make my hair feel heavy. The scalp massager is slightly different from whatâ€™s pictured, but itâ€™s still really nice to use. It gives a good amount of pressure without being too harsh, and paired with the oil, it turns the whole thing into a mini self-care moment. Obviously, Iâ€™ll need more time to see if it helps with growth or thickness, but so far itâ€™s been a great addition to my nighttime routine. If youâ€™re in that â€œtrying to take better care of my scalp without going full wellness influencerâ€ phase like I am, this is a solid start.
